original_title: State Minister to Investigate Shortcomings of Aswasuma Welfare Benefit Scheme
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – State Minister of Social Empowerment, Anupa Pasqual, has announced that an investigation will be carried out to address the shortcomings of the Aswasuma welfare benefit scheme.
The State Minister expressed his commitment to visiting all districts across the island and engaging in discussions with the divisional secretaries to gather valuable insights and feedback.
Individuals who have not been included in the Aswesuma program are encouraged to submit their appeals by the 10th of July.
